Articles.Content: Hi? Can i ask for any problems between Mechjeb and ISS pack?  I'm using them with errors on autopilot that the rocket with ISS part often fly unbalanced. Thank you very much!

> 
> 
> On 10/18/2015, 10:35:35, Irenicus said:
> 
> 
> No wait, it is dock wituot KIS ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) The KIS need only for attach S0 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> [![66d95b80dafb.jpg](http://s016.radikal.ru/i337/1510/67/66d95b80dafb.jpg)](http://s016.radikal.ru/i337/1510/67/66d95b80dafb.jpg "Enlarge image")
> 

 Your orientation is incorrect, Your Rassvett is supposed to be on the zenith part of the Zarya Module and your Zarya is rotated 45% off  the only open port on zarya is zenith and thats where Rassvett mounts,  On your Zvezna Module you need Pirs at your Zenith port, and Poisk at your Nadir Port. No other ports are available and should be closed.   Both your Zvezna and Zarya are also rotated 45 degrees for the solar panels should be aligned with the truss. Your quest Module is on the opposite side of the Unity Module,   when you fix the Rotation of your Zvezna and Zarya modules you will have to fold in the Zarya Solar panels as they do in Real Life, so not to interfere with the S2 panels. 

 Use this pic to reference the correct orientation![Screenshot_1_1.jpg~original](http://i8.photobucket.com/albums/a17/mghslowell/Screenshot_1_1.jpg~original)

![Screenshot_3_1.jpg~original](http://i8.photobucket.com/albums/a17/mghslowell/Screenshot_3_1.jpg~original)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-17T16:29:44Z" title="12/17/2015 04:29  PM" data-short="8 yr">December 17, 2015</time> by mghslowell**
If anyone is interested, I'm working on a BEAM module for ISS. I plan to have it finished before the real BEAM launches to station. I can post a link here when I release it of anyone's interested.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, sciencepanda said:
> 
> 
> If anyone is interested, I'm working on a BEAM module for ISS. I plan to have it finished before the real BEAM launches to station. I can post a link here when I release it of anyone's interested.
> 

 Oh Please DO !  i want to make my ISS identical to the real one and expect the new NAUKA module soon to replace PIRS

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, mghslowell said:
> 
> 
> Oh Please DO !  i want to make my ISS identical to the real one and expect the new NAUKA module soon to replace PIRS
> 

That's why I'm making BEAM. I have a save in KSP where I have the entire ISS and update it whenever anything changes. The save is basically a replica of the actual ISS... I even used the Crew Manifest mod to create Kerbals with the correct names. I've been looking for a mod with BEAM, and haven't found one... So I decided to make one myself. The quality won't quite match up to the rest of the mod, but I hope it will at least be reasonable. I'm thinking about making Nauka as well, but since it isn't planned for launch till 2017, I figure I have plenty of time.

edit:

I just looked at a few detailed pictures of Nauka, and it seems to almost identical to Zarya... So you could probably just reuse the existing Zarya in the mod.

 Correct  Mid 2017 if no further delays.  we would like to see FGB-2 aka nauka and UM bottom dock  and the rest of the new Russian Station parts to be added in the future. I currently alsohave Community ISS and Mike NZ ISS package with SS with ELC  Mobile Servicing System with working canadarm2  on the  Mobile Transporter car so fantastic now and so frame friendly!  i too also update my ISS to match real world Ops.  just actually undocked the Cygnus 4 I will be using that Mod to rename the kerbals to match the ISS crew.    Lack luster labs has an expandable inflatable work station. have you see that ?

I know. I'm excited for the mission... Partially because of the BEAM module, but mostly because it's Dragons first CRS mission since the RS-7 anomaly. Anyway, I have one question: Should I add the BEAM logo to the side? I think the real one has the logo on the side of the inflated section. The thing is It may take a while to get it right. If I don't add it, I can release BEAM either tomorrow or Friday (it'll would be a Christmas present). If I do add the logo, I'm not sure when I'll release it.
Release without the logo first,

Never mind.... logo was easier than I thought....

HI,

Does anyone have the original .obj or .dae files of the Truss Segments ?

I am building this in orbit but need to reduce part count so i thought of creating a single-part truss object (i build in orbit, drop it down, clean up/reduce parts in SPH and then HyperEdit it back to orbit), just cant import the .mu files to any Modelling program (tried Lightwave, Modo, Wings3D)
Triston and I are actively seeking out Mike to find the answers to you questions.  Please be patient.
